item.title: First Post
item.description:
Hello â€” this is the first post on the site. Edit mysite/content/posts/first-post.md to write your post.

  • Use Markdown for content formatting.
  • Add images by placing them in mysite/static/images/ and referencing them as /images/your-image.jpg.

More posts will automatically appear if the theme lists posts.
